About.title: About me
About.description: With over 15 years of experience in the ever-evolving world of software development, I've dedicated the past 5 years to frontend development, with a focus on React.
About.role: Besides my role as developer, I'm involved in most of the technical decisions, including design, architecture and development of core components, as well as, in activities related to configuration management, continuous integration, support, coaching and training other team members, keeping always in mind product quality.
About.collaborate: Let's collaborate and bring your digital vision to life.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: As a vendor, I've had the opportunity to collaborate with these outstanding clients.
Experience.clientDescription1: Media company formed by the merger of WarnerMedia and Discovery, Inc., offering a vast array of entertainment content.
Experience.clientDescription2: Popular online job search platform, connecting job seekers with employers worldwide.
Experience.clientDescription3: A global leader in professional services, providing innovative solutions in auditing, consulting, and advisory services.

Riddler.question: What do I know about you
Riddler.disclaimer: This site does not store any of this information.
